name: pxstat-workbench
description: Firefox extension for analyzing CSO PXStat data with DuckDB

scripts.copy-files: npm run copy-wasm && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-prompt
scripts.copy-wasm: mkdir -p dist/export/lib && cp node_modules/@duckdb/duckdb-wasm/dist/duckdb-mvp.wasm dist/export/lib/ && cp node_modules/@duckdb/duckdb-wasm/dist/duckdb-eh.wasm dist/export/lib/ && cp node_modules/@duckdb/duckdb-wasm/dist/duckdb-browser-mvp.worker.js dist/export/lib/ && cp node_modules/@duckdb/duckdb-wasm/dist/duckdb-browser-eh.worker.js dist/export/lib/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
